creditline: Gift of funds from Mr. and Mrs. Samuel H. Maslon
inscription:
58 haiku poems about spring
*First poem was made by the Kabuki actor, Nakamura Utaemon III, whose poet name was Shikan.

It was compiled by Oka Seibi. (Accroding to Scott Johnson, June 2012)
markings:
\"Jun\" seal
\"Kankan kaku ei shiki\"(meaning unknown) wrtien in the center cartouche
medium: Woodblock print (surimono); ink and color on paper
title: (Canopy for viewing cherry blossoms)
